article: A small man ih his wheelchair gently makes his way into Line 2 subway. He pulls out his microphone, MP3 player and speaker. He clears his  _  and smiles uncomfortably. "At that time, rural medical conditions were very poor and the doctor wasn't very  _  ". But now singing in subways can let me live day by day better than  _  things before." Gao  _  his brightest days in Beijing performing music with two friends.
